widget.title: PasswordField
widget.p: PasswordField is similar to TextField component, but does not show the original characters.

parameters.parameter: text, columns, editable, start, end, and action parameters are similar to textfield
name, enabled, visible, tooltip, property, width, height, colspan, rowspan, weightx, weighty, halign, and valign parameters are similar to component

keys.key: Right arrow, Left arrow, Ctrl-right arrow, Ctrl-left arrow, Home, End, Backspace, Delete, Ctrl-A, Ctrl-Slash, Ctrl-Backslash, Ctrl-V, and Tab actions behave similar to textfield
Doesn't cut selected text into the clipboard
Doesn't copy selected text into the clipboard
